Literature Review: Direct mass spectrometry (MS) technologies have revolutionized the field of tissue analysis, offering unparalleled speed, chemical specificity, and analytical sensitivity. These advancements have far-reaching implications for disease characterization, diagnosis, and treatment. This review aims to provide an overview of recent health-related developments and applications of direct MS technologies, with a focus on their potential to accelerate clinical research and disease diagnosis.
